title: The CIA - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/2/22
itunes:title: The CIA - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/2/22
description:
George Noory and retired CIA counterterrorism specialist Ric Prado discuss his career in the agency, how agents undertake dangerous missions to disrupt foreign powers and terrorist groups, and what he thinks will happen with the Russia/Ukraine conflict.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
